Name: Grass-Guard
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bulbasaur, Ivysaur, and Venusaur.  Swap a Bulba-Claw and a Bulba-Fang for a Grass-Guard at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
